p: Full-length CPSF1 cDNA was cloned into the mammalian vector pENTER for overexpression and confirmed by sequencing. The plasmid was transfected into HCC cell lines using Lipofectamine TM 3000 reagent (Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA, United States). For knockdown assays, small interfering RNAs (siRNAs) targeting CPSF1 were purchased from Shanghai GenePharma Co., Ltd. (Shanghai, China). Transfection was performed using Lipofectamine TM RNAiMAX (Invitrogen). The siRNA sequences used are listed in Supplementary Table 1.
